kpi.name: M1001C247

kpi_info.title: RRC CONN SETUP FAIL DUE TO RNTI ALLO FAIL
kpi_info.use: Number of RRC setup failures caused by RNTI allocation failure. UPDATED:When the RNC decides to reject the RRC connection request due to RNTI allocation failure caused by RRMU overload. After this, the RNC sends an RRC: RRC CONNECTION REJECT message to the UE. (See the section "Failure and abnormal release causes" for more details)

kpi.kpi_alias: RRC CONN SETUP FAIL DUE TO RNTI ALLO FAIL
